name: ca-firm-ops-dashboard
description: A role-based operational dashboard for CA Firms built using the MERN stack with TypeScript and TailwindCSS

scripts.build: npm run build:client && npm run build:server
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules client/node_modules server/node_modules client/dist server/dist
